page.title: 04CHURCH /PART 2/ FLOWERS
page.content: Inside the church there is a reed organ which looks like lots of pipes with holes in. On one of the window sills there is a statue of a head and shoulders of a man who looks Norman Also there are more usual things like an altar, wooden pews and there are quite elaborate stained glass windows. At the back of the church there is a table with leaflets, postcards and there is also a visitors book with names of people from Canada, Wales America, California and different parts of Britain. {FLOWERS:} The dog rose is a wild rose which is white or pink. It is said to be bad luck to bring these into the house because they carry the devil in them. Bluebells are blue but can be pink or white. They are wild and grow in shady clearings or hedgerows, blooming from March to June
